titles.title: Planes Not Panels Act
Planes Not Panels Act
To amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to prohibit the President from making provision for the purchase of solar panels under the authority of such Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Planes Not Panels Act
This bill prohibits the President from using any authority under the Defense Production Act of 1950 to make provision for purchases of or commitments to purchase solar panels.
